segments.text: Hello , this is Wal-mart . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . What time do you close , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We close at 10:00 every day . And we open at 9:00 in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh . Ok . And are you open on the weekends ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Same hours as on the weekdays .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow . You guys never take a break ! I want to come in and have a look at your sale . Your sale is still on , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it runs till the end of the month . But things are clearing out fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , I'll come down tonight . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
